welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Legnaro, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Marco Polo Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
